info.name: The Darker - Firefox new tab and about:blank
info.description:
Dark version of about:newtab and about:blank.
Darkens background, thumbnails and search input field.
Fork of https://userstyles.org/styles/129431/the-dark-and-flat-firefox-new-tab
info.additionalInfo:
* Added dark theme to search bar suggestions
* Changed cell shadow to a dark color

* Search bar suggestions not as dark
* Added dark theme to "customize" button (top right corner)
